ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of HEATHER LENORE MICHAUD of Saturna, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 2, 2023.
